full_description:
Corsair CX Series CX550 550W 80 PLUS Bronze Semi-Modular ATX Power Supply

The Corsair CX Series CX550 power supply is a dependable and efficient option for current PC systems. This semi-modular ATX power supply has a power output of 550W and 80 PLUS Bronze certification, resulting in up to 88% operating efficiency, less heat generation, and decreased energy expenditures. Full continuous power delivery ensures that your computer performs consistently and reliably. The CX550's 120mm thermally regulated low-noise cooling fan provides silent operation. The fan only runs at high speed when there is a high load, and it automatically slows down for quieter performance when there is a lower demand. This technology not only makes computing quieter, but also increases the power supply's total longevity. The CX Series power supply's short 125mm length makes installation straightforward in most recent PC cases. The device has black-sleeved wires and a black powder-coated shell, which give a clean and attractive touch to any PC setup. Corsair backs the CX550 with a five-year warranty, giving users confidence in their purchase. Customers may also benefit from Corsair's global technical assistance, which ensures reliable power for their systems and peace of mind in the event of any technical concerns. The Corsair CX Series CX550 is a well-rounded power supply unit that offers efficiency, quiet operation, and a sleek design, making it an excellent choice for a variety of PC systems.

title: Corsair RMe Series RM750e ATX 3.0 certified Fully Modular Low-Noise ATX Power Supply
cat_seo_title: Corsair Power Supplies Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Corsair Power Supply at the best price in Bangladesh. Use Corsair power supply for your gaming PC for a smooth Gaming experience. To purchase, visit Star Tech shop or order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
Corsair RMe Series RM750e ATX 3.0 certified Fully Modular Low-Noise ATX Power Supply

The Corsair RMe Series RM750e is a Fully Modular Low-Noise Power Supply that provides your PC with quiet, consistent power with 80 PLUS Gold efficiency. RMe PSUs provide the connections needed to power today's demanding PC gear, including two 8-pin EPS12V cables and a variety of PCIe 8-pin power connectors. Industrial-grade, 105°C-rated capacitors provide excellent electrical performance and are covered by a seven-year guarantee. With support for the new Modern Standby sleep mode, you can wake up your computer faster and use less power. Fully modular cables make PC construction simple since you just connect the cables your system requires. The CORSAIR RMe Series offers consistent power for your system, with a 140mm-long shell that works with practically any current chassis.

Fully Modular Cabling

The Corsair RM750e 750W Fully Modular Power Supply Reduces cable clutter by connecting just the cables your system needs. Five universal 8-pin connections may be utilized with any 8-pin cable, meeting all of the power requirements of current motherboards and GPUs.

Tuned for Low Noise Operation

The Corsair RMe Series RM750e 750W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply has a 120mm rifle-bearing fan with a specially calculated fan curve that keeps fan noise down, even when operating at full load. With Zero RPM Fan Mode for near-silent operation at lower loads.

Technology and Dependability

Each RMe Series power supply has a strong resonant LLC architecture with DC-DC conversion and 105° rated industrial-grade capacitors for consistent, dependable power and superior electrical performance. RMe supports Modern Standby with accurate timing, ensuring incredibly quick wake-from-sleep speeds and improved low-load efficiency.

80 Plus Gold Certified

Consistent power production with up to 90% efficiency, as well as Cybernetics Platinum certification for lower power consumption, less noise, and cooler temperatures.

Buy Corsair RMe Series RM750e 750W 80+ Gold Fully Modular ATX Power Supply from Star Tech

The Corsair RM850e 850W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply offers compatibility and simplicity of installation with its sturdy ATX12V Version 3.0 socket and Type 4 cable design. With three PCIe connectors and two EPS connectors, it can accommodate up to three times the power of a modern motherboard and GPU. Its continuous power output of 850 watts can easily power the newest graphics cards, such as the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40 Series. The Corsair RM850e 850W 80 Plus Gold Power Supply's fully modular design facilitates efficient cable management, and its seven SATA and four PATA ports accommodate a wide range of peripheral and storage devices. This Corsair RM850e 850W 80 Plus Gold Power Supply uses the ATX 3.0 standard to assure great efficiency and dependability. Its 105°C certified industrial-grade capacitors and resonant LLC topology also provide consistent and clean power delivery. The Corsair RM850e 850W Power Supply offers both performance and efficiency, with features like Zero RPM Mode for silent operation at lower loads and support for Modern Standby technology. It achieves up to 90% efficiency with Cybernetics Platinum certification for lower power consumption, reduced noise, and cooler operation. Because of its small size, the PSU has more room behind it, which reduces cable clutter and improves system airflow.

The HXi Series PSUs have a 140mm fluid dynamic bearing fan with Zero RPM mode support for long-lasting fan performance and near-silent operation when the fan shuts off at low and medium loads, only spinning as fast as needed. full_description:
Corsair HX Series HX850 850W 80+ Platinum Full-Modular ATX Power Supply

The Corsair HX Series HX850 is a high-quality power supply designed for high-performance PCs where reliability and efficiency are essential. It features 80 PLUS Platinum certification, providing extremely efficient power delivery and reducing operating costs and excess heat. With its fully modular design, the HX850 allows for easy installation and clean cable management, resulting in a neat and visually appealing build. The Corsair HX850 is its virtually silent operation. It utilizes a Zero RPM Fan Mode, meaning the fan remains off until it's needed, resulting in quiet operation at low and medium loads. This feature is particularly beneficial for users who prioritize a silent computing experience. The power supply offers a choice between single +12V rail or multi +12V rail mode, allowing users to toggle between different power delivery configurations based on their specific needs. In the "SINGLE" position, the full output capability of the +12V rail is available to all connectors. On the other hand, in the "MULTIPLE" position, each individual connector has Over-Current Protection, ensuring that no more than 40A of current is delivered on any given cable. The Corsair HX850 is built with premium internal components, including all Japanese 105°C capacitors, which enhance power delivery and contribute to long-term reliability. These high-quality components ensure stable operation even under demanding conditions, making the power supply a reliable choice for high-performance systems. The Corsair HX Series HX850 is a top-tier power supply that offers platinum-level efficiency, virtually silent operation, and a fully modular design. With its exceptional build quality and reliable performance, it is a great choice for users seeking a power supply that can meet the demands of their high-performance PCs while providing a quiet and efficient computing experience.

title: Corsair RM1000e 1000W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply
cat_seo_title: Corsair Power Supplies Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Corsair Power Supply at the best price in Bangladesh. Use Corsair power supply for your gaming PC for a smooth Gaming experience. To purchase, visit Star Tech shop or order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
Corsair RM1000e 1000W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply

The Corsair RM1000e is a Fully Modular Low-Noise Power Supply that provides your PC with quiet, consistent power with 80 PLUS Gold efficiency. RMe PSUs provide the connections needed to power today's demanding PC gear, including two 8-pin EPS12V cables and a variety of PCIe 8-pin power connectors. Industrial-grade, 105°C-rated capacitors provide excellent electrical performance and are covered by a seven-year guarantee. With support for the new Modern Standby sleep mode, you can wake up your computer faster and use less power. Fully modular cables make PC construction simple since you just connect the cables your system requires. The CORSAIR RMe Series offers consistent power for your system, with a 140mm-long shell that works with practically any current chassis.

Fully Modular Cabling

The Corsair RM1000e 1000W Fully Modular Power Supply Reduce cable clutter by connecting just the cables your system need. Five universal 8-pin connections may be utilized with any 8-pin cable, meeting all of the power requirements of current motherboards and GPUs.

Technology and Dependability

Each RMe Series power supply has a strong resonant LLC architecture with DC-DC conversion and 105° rated industrial-grade capacitors for consistent, dependable power and superior electrical performance. RMe supports Modern Standby with accurate timing, ensuring incredibly quick wake-from-sleep speeds and improved low-load efficiency.

Tuned for Low Noise Operation

The Corsair RM1000e 1000W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply has a 120mm rifle-bearing fan with a specially calculated fan curve that keeps fan noise down, even when operating at full load. With Zero RPM Fan Mode for near-silent operation at lower loads.

80 Plus Gold Certified

Consistent power production with up to 90% efficiency, as well as Cybernetics Platinum certification for lower power consumption, less noise, and cooler temperatures. The Corsair RM1000e 1000W 80+ Gold Fully Modular Power Supply comes with a 10-year warranty.

Corsair RM1000e 1000W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular ATX 3.0 Power Supply (UK)

The Corsair RM1000e 1000W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply (UK) provides superior performance and dependability for demanding PC systems. It satisfies strict requirements for efficiency and dependability and guarantees steady power delivery thanks to ATX 3.0 compliance. By connecting only the essential wires, users can reduce cable clutter thanks to its entirely modular cables. The Corsair RM1000e 1000W Power Supply can handle the power requirements of contemporary motherboards and GPUs because it has five universal 8-pin connectors. To ensure compatibility with the newest graphics cards, such as the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40 Series, a PCIe 5.0 12VHPWR GPU cable is included. Nearly silent operation at lower loads is provided by the Corsair RM1000e 1000W 80 Plus Gold Fully Modular Power Supply with Zero RPM Fan Mode, which also gives additional space behind the PSU due to its small design. Stable and dependable power production is guaranteed by its strong resonant LLC architecture, DC-DC conversion, and 105° rated industrial-grade capacitors. It allows for quicker wake-from-sleep timings and increased low-load efficiency, supporting Modern Standby. This Corsair RM1000e 1000W 80 Plus Gold Power Supply is a great option for high-performance PC setups because it also has up to 90% efficiency, which results in lower power consumption, less noise, and cooler temps.
